email.body: Please find attached the WZO Registration Form
email.subject: WZO Registration Form -

instruction.click: Click on the button to open an email to the WZO Office and attach the PDF
instruction.email: The email should be sent to the following addresses:
instruction.remindPdf: Dont forget to add the PDF as an attachment

pdf.commitment: I commit irrevocably and hereby authorize payment of the "Zionist Shekel" in the amounts and methods determined by the World Zionist Organization.
pdf.details-intro: The following are my personal details in accordance with Regulation 1A(c) of the Constitution Regulations:
pdf.gdpr: I agree to the use of the information collected above in accordance with the GDPR regulations, as applicable, in my country of residence.
pdf.join: I hereby request to join the World Zionist Organization and I accept the Jerusalem Program.
pdf.request: In accordance with Article 5 of the World Zionist Organization Constitution and Regulation 1A of the Regulations of the World Zionist Organization Constitution, I hereby request to join the World Zionist Organization.
pdf.subject: Request to join the World Zionist Organization
